short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple One Time Password generator for Chrome

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Very simple OTP client for Chrome with AutoGen feature.

Open the Profile drawer and enter your seed string, toggle 'Auto generation' on/off for continuous password generation.  
Make sure you save your Profile!

Once you are set up, use this little app to generate time based One Time Passwords.

Enjoy!
